reviewText: Ok but it didn't hold my attention till the end.

I never thought Israelis and Indians can come so close to each other. It was amazing for me to understand how these guys learn hebrew in order to offer the Israelis many services: Food and laundries for example. The result? Funny experience with touch of love story, religion, drugs and more. Very recommended!

That movie is documenting present situation of entire generation: The Young Israelis that try to find themselves in India. The result: a mixture of cultures on the screen: Hindus who talk Hebrew, Israelis in the remote villages and the relationship between them.
